ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Martin Aydin has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 10 years. Currently he is employed as a Software Developer at Premiere Systems Support's (PSS) Communication Service. Martin has extensive knowledge of Java, CSP, shell scripting, Microsoft SharePoint, SQL, MySQL, Java Server Pages, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, ETL, UNIX, Microsoft SQL Server, Linux, JDBC, Informatica, Dynamic Host Control protocol, Domain Name Server Protocol, CVS, Apache WEB Server, XML, VoIP (Voice over IP), UML/OMT, Sun Solaris, Oracle, Object Oriented Analysis/Design, Microsoft Internet Information Server, Microsoft Exchange Server, JavaScript, IVR, HTTP, HTML, HP-UX, Apache Subversion, Active Directory, AWK, AIX UNIX, jQuery, XML Parsing, Software Development Life Cycle, RDBMS, QoS (Quality of Service), Personal Home Page, NetBeans, Multi-threading, Microsoft .NET Technology, Java Servlets, JUnit, FTP, ECLiPSe, Database Design, Agile Methodology, AJAX. So far Martin has not gained any managerial experience.
